nodes.text: The Raydonian settlement was located in the thick forests of the Outer Rim planet of Raydonia during the time of the Clone Wars.

Around 20 BBY, the Force-sensitive Dathomirian Zabrak Savage Opress and his brother Darth Maul arrived at the village aboard the Turtle Tanker to get the attention of the Jedi by slaughtering the population of the hamlet. Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi later came to the destroyed village after receiving a holographic message from Maul who told him him to come the village alone. Maul warned Kenobi that if he did not arrive, he would kill all of the hostages and burn the planet. Kenobi later confronted both Maul and Opress with the help of former Dark Acolyte Asajj Ventress.
